EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Boston Workshop and Open House event. See event details below.
Date: March 16, 2016 Time: Talks/Workshops 8:30 A.M. - 4:30 P.M. Open House Reception 6:00 - 9:00 P.M. Location: 145 Broadway, 3rd Floor Cambridge, MA 02142
{{my.Save the date both}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/transformation-workshop-and-open-house/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=boston-open-house]]>.
